    FOXTAIL FARMS PROMISE

    Without any sneaky tricks.

    At Foxtail Farms our mission is to nourish families in our community whether it is around their kitchen table, at the school cafeteria or at community food banks or pantries. Everyone deserves to have the best nutrition accessible to them, and we are committed to donate our products for consumers in need or when times are tough. We donate multiple loads per year to food banks and always look to work with our government programs for school lunches and WIC programs to close the gap in nutrition. We recognize our communities have been in extra need this year and have ramped up our efforts to support food deprived families and essential workers affected by the Covid pandemic.

    Marc urbealis- 2022

    MBP Educational Network on GitHub
